caption: This is an alternative metal music piece. There is a male vocal singing loudly initially with a cleaner character and then with a heavy vocal fry. The distorted electric guitar is playing a heavy riff with the bass guitar in the background. The rhythmic background consists of an aggressive acoustic drum metal beat. The atmosphere is rebellious and violent. This piece can be used in the soundtrack of an action video game or a thriller movie during scenes of a face-off or a combat.
